verbs.description: hasbro [V: is] making fortnite versions of monopoly and nerf blasters the massively popular multiplayer survival game fortnite has over 125 million players worldwide and more than 1 billion in revenue epic games monopoly donald mustard twitter hasbro mark rein software executive fortnite battle royale film
